sub_fields.label: Pull section up
sub_fields.name: pull_section_up
sub_fields.instructions: When the section is pulled up, it'll be pulled up and go underneath the section before it by 45px.

sub_fields.label: Pull up
sub_fields.name: pull_up
sub_fields.instructions: Enabling this will pull up the overlay text (Goal).

sub_fields.label: Left Column
sub_fields.name: left_column
sub_fields.instructions: Make text strong/bold to make it bigger and orange.
